izzy.classification.true_negatives¶

izzy.classification.true_negatives(y_true, y_pred, sample_weights=None)[source]¶

Compute true negatives

Parameters

  • y_true (ArrayLike) – True outcomes

  • y_pred (ArrayLike) – Predicted outcomes

  • sample_weights (ArrayLike) – Weight for observations

Returns

True negatives for each class

Return type

dict
